channel.title: [pi] npc drops and slayer[edit]
channel.description:
ok well i got all the drops and items i want to be droped settled but the npcs dont drop. ive tried to put the rareity at 1-1000 and still they wont drop.no npcs drop anything and i have items set on all of them. can you tell me why or how to fix?
also i can get my slayer task, kill the npc assigned to me but my assignment will stay at 15 or20 or whatever number of npc's i was assigned. how do i fix this. i have looked in the slayer.java and the npc id's match with the ones i have spawned.

i can get my slayer task, kill the npc assigned to me but my assignment will stay at 15 or20 or whatever number of npc’s i was assigned. how do i fix this. i have looked in the slayer.java and the npc id’s match with the ones i have spawned.
